sect1.title: External Interfaces
sect1.para: DoIP is a complex device driver and it has interfaces only with other CDDs and BSW modules.

sect1.title: External Dependencies
sect1.para:
The interfaces provided by DoIP component are used by:
DCM
DiagMasterSlave
Mirroring
DynTpDoIP
RoutingTask
SoMgr
Ethernet Handler
DiagnosticTimers.
DoIP component from depends on the following components:
DCM
DiagMasterSlave
Mirroring
DynTpDoIP
GenericTransmit
SoMgr
Ethernet Handler.

The dependencies and their justification is described in EA at following path:
VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.NW_Eth_Chorus.DoIP.Components.DoIP.SW Architecture.Static Behavior
